entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
